enWisdom: Good etiquette is the best merit
The noblest of personal merits is good etiquette
The noblest merit is good etiquette

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا الشَّرَفُ بِالْعَقْلِ وَالْأَدَبِ لَا بِالْمَالِ وَالْحَسَبِ
enWisdom: Indeed honour is only attained by intellect and etiquette, not because of wealth and lineage
Good etiquette covers up bad lineage

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْأَدَبِ أَفْضَلُ نَسَبٍ وَأَشْرَفُ سَبَبٍ
enWisdom: Good etiquette is the best attribute and noblest means

Wisdom: حَسَبُ الْأَدَبِ أَشْرَفُ مِنْ حَسَبِ النَّسَبِ
enWisdom: The value of good etiquette is nobler than the value of lineage
Seeking [good] etiquette is the embellishment of [one’s] honourable lineage
Adopt good etiquette for it is the embellishment of honourable lineage

Wisdom: قَلِيلُ الْأَدَبِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرِ النَّسَبِ
enWisdom: A little good etiquette is better than many noble ancestors

Wisdom: مَنْ قَعَدَ بِهِ حَسَبُهُ نَهَضَ بِهِ أَدَبُهُ
enWisdom: One who is lowered by his lineage is elevated by his good etiquette
The magnanimity of an intelligent person is his religion and his distinction is his etiquette
The best attribute is good etiquette
There is no merit like good etiquette
There is no rank higher than good etiquette
